name: Shotput
description:
Shotput is a sport about Technique, Power, and Skill. Do you have what it takes to master all three? Designed as a prototype mobile game.

  • Game Design/Programming: Seth Konoza
  • Art: Kenney from https://kenney.nl/
  • Background Music: Komiku from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Sound...

Instructions:

  • Click on the shotput
  • Click on the corresponding arrow buttons when their arrow reaches the end of the line (or use left, right, or up arrow keys if playing on the computer) to build power
  • Click on the shotput again to launch it in the direction of the black arrow
